name: Flying Tree Curer
description:
The flying tree in the village is dying. You need to give commands to your villagers to collect ingredients and make recipes to cure the sacred tree. There are 4 groups of ingredients and each group has 3 species. Berries and Flowers are abundant but Mushrooms are located at the edge of the map and the gems are close to the river. the villagers need to deliver the collected ingredients to the well in the town. 

The game was developed in 48 hours as a part of GGJ 2023 at Epitech Brussels

Utku Fişek - Game Design, Level Design 

Mabanza Danali - Game Development 

Marius Brisson - Game Development 

Florent Brassart - Game Development 

Victor Thouvenin - Game Development
